orderShipped.title: Order shipped
orderShipped.description: Order #4312 is on the way and arriving tomorrow.

newComment.title: New comment
newComment.description: Maya left feedback on the Q3 planning doc.

weeklyReport.title: Weekly report
weeklyReport.description: Your analytics summary is ready to view.

login.title: Login to your account
login.subtitle: Enter your email below to login to your account

loginMfa.title: Verify your sign-in
loginMfa.subtitle: Enter the six-digit code from your authenticator.

register.title: Create an account
register.subtitle: Enter your details below to create your account
register.termsPrefix: By clicking create account, you agree to our

created.title: Registration successful!
created.description: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please verify your email to activate your account.

unverified.title: Account not verified
unverified.description: Your account is not verified yet. You can resend the verification email below.

deactivated.title: Account deactivated
deactivated.description: Your account was previously deactivated. Please contact our support if you need help.

notAllowed.title: Account not allowed
notAllowed.description: Your account is not allowed to register right now. Please contact our support if you need help.

resend.limit: You have reached the resend limit. Try again in 15 minutes.
resend.hint: Didn't get the email? We'll send another verification link.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send reset instructions

forgotPasswordSuccess.title: Check your email
forgotPasswordSuccess.description: If an account exists for this email, you'll receive a reset email.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.subtitle: Create a new password for your account
resetPassword.hint: Use 8-72 characters with upper/lowercase letters and a number.

invalid.title: Reset link is invalid
invalid.description: This link is missing, expired, or already used. Request a new reset link.

success.title: Password reset
success.description: Your password has been updated. You can now log in with your new password.

verifyEmail.title: Verify your email
verifyEmail.subtitle: Enter the email you used to register and confirm your account

invalid.title: Invalid verification link
invalid.description: This link is missing, expired, or already used. Please request a new verification email.

verifying.title: Verifying your email
verifying.description: Hold on while we confirm your account.

toasts.mfaTokenMissing: MFA token missing. Please sign in again.
toasts.registerSuccess: Account created. Please verify your email.
toasts.forgotPasswordSuccess: Check your email for reset instructions
toasts.resetPasswordSuccess: Your password has been reset. Please log in.
toasts.verifySuccess: Your email has been verified. You can now log in.
toasts.verifyInvalid: Verification link is invalid or expired.
toasts.sessionMissing: Login session missing. Please try again.

password.uppercase: Password must include at least one uppercase letter
password.lowercase: Password must include at least one lowercase letter
password.number: Password must include at least one number
